planet.name: Kepler-58 b
KOI 1336.01
KID 4077526
planet.description: This planet candidate was discovered by the Kepler spacecraft. It transits its host star every 10.22 days for 4.3967 hours. Periodic transit timing variations confirm its planetary nature.

planet.description: This planet candidate was discovered by the Kepler spacecraft. It transits its host star every 15.57 days for 5.1013 hours. Periodic transit timing variations confirm its planetary nature.
